author: Mavrrick
releaseNotes:
2.0.21 Create new drivers for Govee Presence sensor
Created new Govee MQTT Listener driver
Update Manual LAN API Driver with Descriptive logging
2.0.20 Fixed bug with debug logging
Fixed bug with Light device driver initialization
2.0.19 Added Scene data for H6052
2.0.18 Further refinement for scene control changes released in previous to builds
 Enabled dreamview toggle control for sync devices
2.0.17 Fixed bug introduced in 2.0.16 for setNextEffect and SetPreviousEffect
2.0.16 Change how Scenes and DiyScenes were displayed under the state variables
Update process to display Scene name and number
ColorMode attribute willdisplay the current mode of the device
2.0.15 Fixed validation of working mode comand
2.0.14 Enhancment for Segement Color RGB command
2.0.13 Added Driver for Gove Smart Fans
Added driver for the Gove Ice Maker
2.0.12 Updated order of items in Scene update page
Updated Humidifier driver with RGB
2.0.11 Added menu option to update a LAN API DIY Scene
2.0.10 Fixed bug related to Device add procedure
Updated to support new API call for DIY scenes added by Govee
Updated routine for device state updates to skip blank or empty updates returned by the API
2.0.9 fix related to new data from Govee API
2.0.8 Fixed working mode command in Humidifier with RGB Driver
2.0.7 Fixed setNextEffect and setPreviousEffect commands
2.0.6 Fixed data extract issue from Govee
 Added support for Govee Temp/Humidity sensors
Fixed issues that may prevent DIY's from showing up in LAN API Mode
Enhanced drivers to recognize temp scale of hub and show temps in correct scale
2.0.5 Fixed bug with Set Temp on Kettle and Heater devices
2.0.4 Added two drivers to help with devices that did not match capabilities
Update Aroma difuser driver
Initial release of Govee Integration with new API
